subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Ralph Beard starred on two N.C.A.A. basketball championship teams and in the N.B.A. before his career was shattered by involvement in a point-shaving scandal.
snippet: Ralph Beard starred on two N.C.A.A. basketball championship teams and in the N.B.A. before his career was shattered by involvement in a point-shaving scandal.
